sentence.text: Overall, our findings establish RASSF4 as a tumor-suppressive mRNA splicing, via spliceosome in MM and provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II inhibitors or bortezomib to treat patients with tumors exhibiting low RASSF4 expression.Significance: These findings provide a mechanistic rationale for combining trametinib with HDAC inhibitors or bortezomib in patients with multiple myeloma whose tumors exhibit low RASSF4 expression.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
